org.qbroker.net

Class MongoDBConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.net.MongoDBConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MongoDBMessenger

    public class MongoDBConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connector
    MongoDBConnector connects to a MongoDB and provides some basic DB operation methods: list(), count(), find(), findone(), insert(), update() and remove().

    This is NOT MT-Safe. Therefore, you need to use multiple instances to achieve your MT-Safty goal.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com
